Words & Kisses.description: Just as I was about to get into another ambiguous, half-hearted relationship, I met her. Hyunjin Go. I couldn't take my eyes off her. I had been treading a dull path, and she knocked me right off. Then I felt it — a little piece of my heart, breaking off and slipping away. "She's so pretty..."

Eye Contact.author: Leesoo
Eye Contact.description: If the Internet were to disappear tomorrow, what would you do? When the "Digital Wipeout" prevents access to digital data on a global scale, the Koos are faced with this exact predicament. Now, this family of social media addicts will have to put down their phones and really connect — face to face.

Pound of Flesh.author: Seoh Nam
Pound of Flesh.description: A world where people share their flesh. I give mine to others, and they carve a piece for me. It's toxic corporate culture on another level — how long could you last in a workplace like this?

Check In to My Heart.author: p.cong
Check In to My Heart.description: Ajin, the newest intern at the ritzy HU Hotel, seems to have it all: looks, intelligence, and money. But when Seolmin, the CEO, discovers that she's living in the basement of his hotel, Ajin desperately makes a deal with him to avoid getting kicked out. But this deal might change her life forever!

My Ex, Client.author: Hera Kang
My Ex, Client.description: Jihyo was already having a bad day on her way to work. But like a bad omen, she then meets her ex-boyfriend as a big client! After a bad breakup, she doesn't want anything to do with him, but he is determined to get her back. What does Jihyo's ex-boyfriend want and why did he decide to show up now?

Love & Wish.author: Ine
Love & Wish.description: 17-year-old Daeun has always been a hopeless romantic. When she moves into a new apartment in Seoul, she falls head over heels for her handsome neighbor. Turns out, they're classmates, so it has to be destiny, right? But could he really be her Prince Charming? Or is he hiding a dark past?

One Step Away From Happiness.author: Byeok Gong-woo
One Step Away From Happiness.description: Bina and Heewoon have known each other since childhood. Now a third-year resident at Hyemun Hospital, she's shocked when he suddenly confesses his feelings for her. The problem? Their 10-year age gap! Will Bina be able to overcome her confusion and get one step closer to happiness?

Prequel Romance.author: Haejeo500M
Prequel Romance.description: Taejin has it all – looks, talent, fame, money – everything except a decent personality! With his reputation on the line, Taejin gets sent to work in a factory for a movie that will save his career. But will he be able to survive a life of hard labor under the beady eyes of factory chief Hasung?

From Bread to Closets.author: Raehyeon Kim
From Bread to Closets.description: Jinsoo is a hoarder, Haeyoung a minimalist. But together, they make the perfect team! After meeting at a bakery as boss and employee, the two start visiting their customers' homes to help them organize their closets and rediscover themselves in the process.

Cheoyong: A Ghostly Romance.author: Yoonmi Lee
Cheoyong: A Ghostly Romance.description: Jaehee, who has been able to see ghosts his entire life, will do anything for money. So he doesn't miss an opportunity when he hears of Cheoyong, the ghost able to grant any and all sorts of fortunes. Instead, what he finds is a sleepwalking girl possessed by Cheoyong... What is this all about?

Eyes Closed.author: Lee Seunghwan
Eyes Closed.description: Hyunwoo makes a living busking in subway stations. Turns out being blind makes people a lot more generous — and a lot more confiding. But when a strange man approaches him with a secret of his own, Hyunwoo is suddenly entangled in a murder case, turning his life upside down.

The Greatest Blunder.author: Double Star History
The Greatest Blunder.description: "Obey my orders! Do not question me!" Set during World War II, one of the greatest disasters in the history of humankind — this is the dramatic story of those whose blunders changed the course of history.

Horns, Horns Everywhere!.author: Nazee
Horns, Horns Everywhere!.description: As a carrier of the “Minotaur Syndrome,” Noon has the antlers and head of an animal. He finally manages to land a job, only to find his new office covered in foliage and the other employees with the same condition as him! Will he be able to make it through this new chapter in life in one piece?

Nowhere But Iceland.author: Yeondu
Nowhere But Iceland.description: Feeling like a failure after giving up her lifelong dream, Kkangjang travels to Iceland, a country where failure is embraced — and also one of the most expensive places in the world. Can she make her journey work on a shoestring budget? Follow along as she travels with the help of a guardian spirit!

My Dear Maid!.author: SpringIsComing
My Dear Maid!.description: Kate knows full well that orphan girls don't get fairy tale endings. But when she saves the kidnapped daughter of Count Blanc, she's given the opportunity of a lifetime: becoming a maidservant at the Blanc Estate. There, she meets Alex, the cold but dashing heir whom she mistakes as a priest...

My Uncle Is a Superstar.author: Huh Wonjin
My Uncle Is a Superstar.description: Forced to give up on his dreams of being a singer to look after his mom and niece, Woojin finds himself in a slump. Then one day, he receives an AI robot that claims it will help him realize his dreams. From struggling carpenter to worldwide superstar — will Woojin finally get his shot?

How to Make Friends and Win Love.author: Juhyung
How to Make Friends and Win Love.description: Desperate to charm his crush, shy Taeoh buys a copy of How to Win Friends and Influence People. To his shock, the book's spirit pops out and starts giving him advice, and he sees a flicker of hope. Follow Taeoh as he learns the art of love, friendship, and social skills from a wise old fox spirit!

Legends of the Nile.author: Bohyun Kim
Legends of the Nile.description: Horus lives the life of a vagabond until one day, the god of wisdom Thoth appears to him and reveals the truth: Horus is the son of Osiris, the rightful ruler of Egypt who was murdered by his own brother. Now begins his quest to avenge his father and reclaim his birthright as king of Egypt!

Before It's Too Late.author: Kion
Before It's Too Late.description: Seohee and Eunho have known one another for 15 years, and they've always been each other's top priority. Their relationship blurs the line between friends, family, soulmates, and lovers. But one day, it comes to a tipping point when Seohee suddenly declares, "Eunho, I can't do this anymore."

The Maid and the Vampire.author: Yujeong Ju
The Maid and the Vampire.description: Areum Yoon, a normal high school girl, falls into a strange isekai world called 'Soltera' after an accident. She is sold as a slave to Millard Travis, a duke and the only vampire in the world. Desperate to survive, she swears to serve the cold-hearted Lord Millard as his personal maid. Will Lord Millard's attitude change with Areum's devotion to him?

As You Wish, Princess!.author: Ryu ho
As You Wish, Princess!.description: After Princess Lemon is saved by her prince, the two are headed straight for a happy ending...! Or so she thought. Poor Princess Lemon is once again left waiting for her Prince Charming. Will she ever succeed in her search for love?

The New Recruit.author: Moscareto
The New Recruit.description: After spending his 20s getting over a crush, Seunghyun vowed to never give his heart to someone in the same field again. Enter Jongchan, Seunghyun's tough new boss with a surprising soft side. Will Seunghyun's first job and first relationship be a success?

My Red String of Fate.author: SHIN JI-SANG
My Red String of Fate.description: After getting sucked into a reverse harem novel, Leann enjoys her quiet life as a priestess in a temple. But things become twisted when the red string of fate irrevocably connects her to an injured man she heals — a man who just happens to be the worst villain in the story!

The Happening.author: Inggun
The Happening.description: Everyone's changing! For some reason, people are turning red and tearing each other apart like zombies. Meanwhile, Lee Park is a high school student with an empathy disorder who suddenly begins to experience emotions for the first time. Will he be able to survive amidst all the chaos?

I See You.author: Pixel
I See You.description: Seowoo has just about had it with life. But when she's about to jump off a bridge, she's interrupted by a grim reaper nobody else can see. Not only that, the reaper wants her to stay alive for 3 more months! A woman who wants to die and a strange reaper — will Seowoo finally find a reason to live?

North x Northwest.author: Noonal
North x Northwest.description: It was all smooth sailing for Lil Schweiz, a famous pirate captain, until some shocking news almost threw her overboard. The notorious Admiral Retiro, known for scalping and feeding his pirate captives to flesh-eating fish, is on his way... And he's coming for one thing only.

Hello and Goodbye.author: Woonipi
Hello and Goodbye.description: Every night, I still picture Bangwool waking me in the morning, waiting by the door for my return, the two of us going out for night walks... But she's gone now, and all I have is grief and regret. She was more than a pet — she was family. I know she'd hate to see me so sad. But how do I move on?

W: Two Worlds.author: Ju_niverse
W: Two Worlds.description: Yeonjoo, the daughter of a famous cartoonist, is a student studying medicine at Hanguk University. On her birthday, after wishing for a man like her favorite comic character, Kang Chul, Yeonjoo wakes up in Kang Chul's world. Will Yeonjoo be able to find her way out of her father’s cartoon universe?

Behind the Logo.author: Bumgeun Song
Behind the Logo.description: Remember Blockbuster? Netflix sure does. Although once a formidable rival, Netflix is now one of the leading companies of the century. Like this, so many of the brands we know and love each have their own story of success. Explained through short and fun comics, Behind the Logo illustrates how companies like Netflix and Nintendo became legends.

Suddenly a Lady.author: EYERING
Suddenly a Lady.description: Deok, a slave girl, would sooner choose death than let her future kids inherit this life. But then her master presents her with an absurd offer: "I'll make you a noblewoman." Deok is elated at the thought of escaping slavehood. But first, she must become a lady.

Let's Get You Better.author: null
Let's Get You Better.description: Plagued by health issues, Boni Min is basically a walking hospital. Then one day a mysterious guy appears. He moves in, gives her medicine, and explains them all to her. Turns out the information is quite useful! Soon enough, Boni finds herself falling for his cold-but-warm-hearted charms...

Temple Romance.author: YIWON HEO
Temple Romance.description: Siwon attracts women wherever he goes. Yet, he’s a virgin, thanks to a personal stalker who always gets in the way. When a psychic says he can escape her by becoming a monk, he joins a temple. Meanwhile, Yoonchae hates the idea of love after years of living with horny parents and only joins the temple because she is forced to. What will become of this man desperate to experience love and this woman who wants nothing to do with it?

Killing Mr. Park.author: Wonseob Sin
Killing Mr. Park.description: One day, Sujin confesses to Min that she wants to kill her husband, Mr. Park, during the company field trip. Min, who has had a crush on Sujin for a long time, agrees to help her with her plan. But on the trip, despite seeming as if she doesn't remember the plan, Sujin acts strangely. What agenda could Sujin be hiding?

Sucker Trick.author: LIM
Sucker Trick.description: They were called monsters and witches before they were accepted into society. Now, they're known as magicians, and they exist to protect and assist humans. There are 24 of them in this world, each with their own rank and abilities. The curtains are drawn, and the stage is ready for them.

The Handbook of Morality.author: Succulent
The Handbook of Morality.description: School teacher Yumi is back in her hometown. She's heard that her old elementary school uses "The Handbook of Morality" in their curriculum, and she's excited to start teaching there. But after running into an old classmate, Yumi is reminded of a past she's desperately tried to forget...

Miss You, Lucifer.author: Moscareto
Miss You, Lucifer.description: Lucifer, a member of the obscure idol group Sweet Devils, dreams of making it big. His one claim to fame — an accidental pants-ripping on air — leads to a chance encounter with A-list star Kwonjun Kang. Turns out, Kwonjun has been harboring an intense crush on Lucifer. What will happen when an unexpected one-night stand leads to an ambiguous romance? How will this A-list star and D-list idol navigate their relationship?

Back to the Highteen.author: Giseon
Back to the Highteen.description: At the age of 27, Boyoung’s reached an all time low. She’s just been dumped, scammed, and still hasn’t graduated from college. When she’s offered the chance to go back to high school in return for a large sum of money, she can’t resist. All she has to do is make sure nobody finds out. Shouldn’t be hard… right?

Totem's Realm.author: SOOHYEON
Totem's Realm.description: In a crazy turn of events, Sera, an office worker, is stranded on a remote island and captured by a native tribe. A mysterious Tarzan-esque man rescues her, but it turns out he’s also on the run. As they flee the tribes that are after them, Sera develops a special power she can’t quite understand. She also feels attracted to the strange man...

Crush on You.author: Gill Son
Crush on You.description: Ever since her parents died in a car crash, Minhee has lived with Pilho’s family, who openly discriminate against her. After an unexpected meeting with the new neighbor, Minhee finds herself growing closer to him, telling him all of her worries. But turns out… he’s a new teacher at her school. Meanwhile, Pilho’s feelings for Minhee grow. Between the forbidden love and her long-time friend, who will Minhee choose?

If You Wish.author: Eulwon Ko
If You Wish.description: Jiyoung, an ordinary high school girl, just happens to come across God? God is fascinated that Jiyoung has never called for Him and suggests a bet: during His stay in the human world, if Jiyoung can suppress the urge to ask Him for anything, He will give her everything she can possibly wish for. She doesn't want to say yes, but who can say no when God looks this good!

The Frog Princess.author: CC
The Frog Princess.description: When a magical potion that can transform any living organism into a human goes awry, it’s up to Sarang the Chameleon to harvest the power of true love and save the Demon World. But can a chameleon masquerading as a human truly blend in with society and accomplish her goal?

Boy From the Future.author: Ine
Boy From the Future.description: High school students Dain Son and Sihyun Lee could hardly be called close. One day, Dain is approached by a man who claims to be Sihyun from the future. What’s more, he says they end up dating and he has traveled back in time to stop a murder. As Dain and “future Sihyun'' become more involved, Dain and “present Sihyun”’s friendship also changes. What will become of such entangled relationships? How will the future change?

200% in Love.author: ZZING
200% in Love.description: Sarang may be a loner at work, but in the MMORPG game Black Star, she’s a charismatic hero! So when the toxic Black Peng steals her thunder as the strongest player, she begins to feel conflicted. Now the search is on — is Black Peng the new Art Director, Junghoon? Or her childhood friend, Joonyoung?

Into It.author: Ongsim
Into It.description:
An A-list actor and a rookie actor meet on the set of a TV show.
“Did I… do well?”
A whirlwind romance that blurs the line between acting and reality!

Taming the Emperor's Hound.author: Jyun
Taming the Emperor's Hound.description: About to be trapped in a loveless marriage, Esmeralda is determined to find a husband of her own choosing. When the handsome Lord Alfonse woos her at her first society event, she decides to take a gamble and asks him to court her. But why didn't anyone tell her he's the emperor's hound?!

Fry My Life.author: Bohyun Kim
Fry My Life.description: After an innocent favor blows up in his face, Hachan is desperate to start afresh. His last remaining hope is to infiltrate a mysterious fried food shop to reveal its secret, which will guarantee him a job as a reporter. But his investigation soon takes him down a completely unexpected path...

My High School Romance.author: Seyoung Kim
My High School Romance.description: Seunghyun hates losing, and so does Yujin. Afraid of losing his brother to Yujin, Seunghyun asks him out. And Yujin, wanting to make Seunghyun suffer, accepts. What could possibly go wrong? More importantly, who's gonna win?!

Go, Haechi, Go!.author: Yushin Kim
Go, Haechi, Go!.description: Legendary creature Haechi lives in Gyeongbokgung Palace. Endearingly round and soft, he has oodles of affection for everyone he meets. What kind of mischief will he get up to today? And what joy will he bring to the ladies of the palace? Follow Haechi's high jinks as he brightens everyone's day!

The Great Selection.author: Eugene Beom
The Great Selection.description: Gana's mother disappeared when he was young, but he believes she may have turned into a dolphin since he can communicate with them. Bullied by his family and other villagers, Gana must decide if he thinks all humans should perish, or if there are enough good ones to cancel out the bad.

Cheolsu Saves the World.author: SooSun
Cheolsu Saves the World.description: Humanity has failed to stop a giant asteroid from plummeting into Earth, and life as we know it has ended. An ordinary Korean office worker named Cheolsu is somehow given the chance to go back in time and prevent this catastrophe from ever happening. Does he have a chance?

The Emperor's Mask.author: Yeoldu
The Emperor's Mask.description: Imagine blacking out and waking up in a different world! A teacher finds herself in the body of Lady Lucia, a woman who committed suicide. While trying to understand what happened, she realizes Lucia was actually murdered. Why does the emperor hide behind a mask? And what really happened to Lucia…?

Her Peculiar Visitor.author: doomin
Her Peculiar Visitor.description: Banished from the celestial realm for interfering in the fate of a mortal, Juhee now lives a mortal life herself as the owner of a bookstore. When she suddenly receives an eviction notice, she visits her landlord to plead her case. But what will she do when he makes her a peculiar offer?

Serial Justice.author: GOEULWON
Serial Justice.description: Aria has been a victim of domestic violence since childhood. Eventually, she sees only one way out: murder. After she kills her father, she sets out to save other victims, and crosses paths with a detective who decides to help her. But can she really justify murder in the name of justice?

The Perfect Replacement.author: Il won
The Perfect Replacement.description: My sister is perfect — so much so that she's been chosen as the hero of another world called Rowold. While she's off saving this new world, she's been replaced by Moomyung, an aloof Rowoldian. He's not the most convincing substitute, so I'm helping him out. But I'm learning from him too.

The Golden Forest.author: Gyeonji
The Golden Forest.description: "Don't forget. You owe me a life, and you promised to be mine." Reniae was blessed with the ability to charm men by the goddess Inanna. But for her, it feels more like a curse. After being taken as a slave to the Golden Forest, she flees to the Northland where she finds Kun... and saves his life.

The Summer of Penguins.author: Ahyoung Woo
The Summer of Penguins.description: Animal behaviorist Hyunwoo's love for penguins drives him all the way over to Antarctica. Once there, however, he encounters a series of mishaps and soon discovers that surviving in the harsh cold is no easy feat. Will Hyunwoo be able to conduct his research and return to Korea in one piece?

The Competition.author: Jeong, Seol-hwa
The Competition.description: Isn't classical music for the rich? Hokyung grew up in an average house, so despite his passion for the violin, he never dreamed of becoming a violinst. When the small violin he had outgrown breaks, his visit to the luthier takes him on an unexpected journey...

The Dangerous Convenience Store.description: Lovesick college student Uijun works part-time at a convenience store in a sketchy, dangerous neighborhood, when one day the sexy, dangerous Geonu makes his grand entrance! But after drunkenly pouring his heart out to him, will Uijun get more than he bargained for?

Snapshots of Beckhee Gong.author: MINJI JEON
Snapshots of Beckhee Gong.description: For Beckhee, who lives in a broken household with a cheating father and a depressed mother, fangirling over the popular K-pop star Tinkerbell was her only solace. But when she realizes that the image of Tinkerbell she had loved for so long was only a fantasy, Beckhee decides it’s time to live for herself, and suddenly moves to Japan. What adventures will she embark upon in her new life?

Observing Elena Evoy.author: Myeongcho
Observing Elena Evoy.description: Blessed with both beauty and brains, it was only natural for Johann to be the top student at the Academy — that is, until Elena Evoy appears. To make things worse, she seems completely unfazed by his charms, shattering his self-esteem. So why can't he stop thinking about her?

Resurrection.author: Gunwoo Jeon
Resurrection.description: Taesoo, K, and I have been best friends since elementary school but one day, K stops coming to school. Taesoo and I visit K but see him die of illness before their very eyes. K's mom tells them that to resurrect K, she has to get the right "ingredients"...

Pandora's Choice.author: Yudori
Pandora's Choice.description: 19th century America can be unforgiving to a half-Asian daughter and alcoholic single father. Pandora, a feisty child, suffers from racial discrimination and the indifference her own father, Christopher, shows towards her. As a result, the two never seem to get along and any interaction leads to a fight. A World Comic Contest Winner, this is a story of two broken people trying to make sense of this world together.

The Unseen.author: Gyosun
The Unseen.description: After a strange incident, Yohan turns invisible with only one friend knowing of his condition. After spending weeks frustrated and alone, he bumps into Eunha, a blind girl, who doesn't realize that he is invisible. What happens when a boy who can't be seen meets a girl who can't see?

The Kiss Virus.author: Hyejung Kim
The Kiss Virus.description: “Have you kissed someone yet?” Yoona is constantly pestered by her parents to hurry up and kiss a boy. Why? Because students who don’t kiss someone before they turn 17 go crazy every time it rains! Yoona doesn’t want to wind up like the others at her school. Will she find someone to kiss in time?

Winter Night.author: Yeonji
Winter Night.description: After running into the mysterious Myodan one morning, Aram begins to see animal spirits. His newfound ability gets him sucked into the world of Winter Night, where he discovers that an unknown force is terrorizing innocent spirits. Will he and Myodan be able to solve this case?

If I Were You.author: Winter
If I Were You.description: Set in the Japanese colonial period, a young girl is gifted a maidservant who looks just like her on her 8th birthday. The fate of the two children entwines as they each carve out their own destiny, surpassing obstacles such as status and gender, education and culture, and ethnicity and race.

Like You've Never Been Hurt.author: KYY
Like You've Never Been Hurt.description: College student Izzy Noh thinks her loving relationship with her boyfriend Minsu will last forever… until he cheats on her. To make things worse, they are not only in the same school, but in the same Game Developer Club. Izzy must now navigate handling the breakup, dealing with her feelings, and possibly opening up to another shot at love. Will Izzy and her friends from the Game Developer Club find true campus love?

The Greatest Villain.author: Sujin Kim
The Greatest Villain.description: Best friends Sawoo and Kido are polar opposites. When Sawoo realizes his innocent attitude was causing him to be bullied, he asks Kido to coach him in becoming the greatest villain. Kido succeeds in teaching him two out of the three rules before moving abroad. When Kido returns after four years, will Sawoo learn the third rule? And why does Kido seem to be so affectionate towards him? They’re just friends… right?

Love on Hold.author: YU HYUN SUK
Love on Hold.description: When Danhee's boyfriend Jeonghu tells her he wants to spend some time apart, she decides to use this chance to enjoy her freedom. But after running into her former crush, Taeyong, she begins to wonder what she really wants out of life.

Whispers Through the Willows.author: Moscareto
Whispers Through the Willows.description: Sangyul's been living a lie since birth. Everyone thinks he's the feeble, omega son of Jodong Pharma's President Han, but in reality, he's as normal as can be. So what's he to do when Korea's sole alpha, Prince Reok, proposes an interesting deal? Will he finally get the ordinary life he so desires?

Byte-Sized Insight.author: Bumgeun Song
Byte-Sized Insight.description: Hi! We're Outstanding, a tech media outlet. The tech and business world is full of innovation and fierce competition. Which company received $2 billion in investments before they even launched? Who saved Apple after Jobs? We bring you all the latest stories in the form of fun and simple comics!

The Good Life.author: Eo Jin
The Good Life.description: Yoochang is a good-looking guy. So good-looking, in fact, that he had to transfer to an all-boys school to escape the horde of adoring girls. But now he's gone from being the subject of catfights to having guys brawl over him! Just how far will Yoochang's good looks take him?

On the Emperor's Lap.author: Yujeong Ju
On the Emperor's Lap.description: At a young age, little orphan Bella was abandoned by Kiris. His betrayal left her a war slave. Years later, Bella finds herself reunited with Kiris — only now, he doesn’t recognize her. Will Bella be able to overcome the pains of her past to find love again?

Tori and Samuel.author: Bobblejot
Tori and Samuel.description: Best friends for life: The story of a sardonic cat and an eager corgi. Follow their adventures as they learn how to live together, care for each other, and welcome new members into their lives!

The Butterfly Girl.author: Hyeon
The Butterfly Girl.description: 17-year-old Bibi Na has a special power -- she can form a chrysalis, and just as a caterpillar transforms into a butterfly, she can emerge with a new look, personality, and abilities. To escape her trauma of being bullied in middle school, she decides to transform. Things get complicated when she transfers schools and meets Yeonwoo, a boy who seems to know about her past. Will Bibi’s power be a gift, or a curse?

By My Side.author: Junghyun
By My Side.description: Hyungbae is a bit of a workaholic. Underappreciated and overworked, he feels burnt out at his current job. Enter Deokbae, a carefree dog that has a mind of his own! Follow Hyungbae and his canine companion as they navigate the ups and downs of life, bringing a whole new meaning to the word "family."

Ouroboros: The Social Cycle.author: LEE JUNG YOON
Ouroboros: The Social Cycle.description: Life at school is bleak for outcast Hyun. But one day, she receives a letter from Jung, her dear old friend from middle school. Filled with nostalgia and excitement, Hyun begins reading the letter... only to discover that their time together was a nightmare for Jung. Where did it all go wrong?

[ blank。].author: lins
[ blank。].description: After waking from a 3-month coma, Nina doesn’t remember anything about herself. Not even her name. With no one looking for her, she only has one option: to start a new life. She’s more than ready to do so until the memory of someone abandoning her in a park haunts her. Can she handle the truth?

Kneel Before Me.author: Sosoo
Kneel Before Me.description: When the unfaithful crown prince calls off their marriage, Lady Kyrie is exiled to a remote cottage. On the way, she discovers a hidden village while avoiding a snowstorm. It's there "the end" is awakened... and it's starting to become obsessed with her.

DEAR. DOOR.author: Pluto
DEAR. DOOR.description: After an investigation into a mysterious cult turns supernatural, police officer Kyungjoon wakes up and finds himself trapped in a place engulfed in flames, crying out in pain. But a mysterious entity tells him he can't die without their permission. What has Kyungjoon gotten himself into?!

Boy's Lipstick.author: MIYEON CHOI
Boy's Lipstick.description: B-Magic is the hottest beauty vlogger in the beauty industry. Everyone is always waiting for her next upload! Little do they know that B-Magic is trying to live a normal life as a high school boy? What secrets is she hiding? And will her classmates uncover her identity?

Für Elise.author: Korichire
Für Elise.description: Taewoo and Yunsol have always been an unlikely pair. As childhood best friends, both are too afraid of losing the other to admit their feelings. But when Yunsol’s soul becomes a part of her doll after a messy accident, things get even more complicated. Will the two be able to find a way for Yunsol to become human again.. and find love on the way?

House of Suspects.author: Hwiyoung
House of Suspects.description: Jack, an animal taxidermist, is branded as a murderer. He was the only one found at the horrendous site, surrounded by blood and a mutilated corpse. The catch: he can’t remember any of it. To escape the stinging glares, he decides to stay at a house for outcasts in the middle of the woods. But could his housemates be hiding secrets of their own?

Wild Dog Misfire.author: Yonghyun
Wild Dog Misfire.description: After his divorce and demotion, Detective Yoon thinks life can't possibly get worse. That is, until his sister asks him to move in with her fiancé Junggu, a former bombmaker trying to get a fresh start. But just as the two misfits become flatmates, Junggu's past comes to haunt him with a bang.

Justice for the Villainess.author: STUDIO107
Justice for the Villainess.description: Charlotte has no qualms about murder if it means her beloved Prince Albert can ascend to the throne. But when he accuses her of treason and leaves her to rot in prison, she learns that loyalty is no virtue. 5 years later, Count Kaitel appears before her with a request: “Won’t you kill the emperor?”

The Quant of Wall Street.author: Hyojin Kim
The Quant of Wall Street.description: The number of individuals investing in stocks is growing daily. But for every brilliant success story, there are countless failures. It isn't easy for small investors to succeed in the ruthless world of stock trading. Still, it isn't impossible — if you can just think like a quant!

G'day.author: Choi Yong Sung
G'day.description: After suddenly losing contact with his sister, Shion heads to Australia on a working holiday visa to find her. As he meets her housemates, he grows particularly suspicious of Hans, the owner of the sharehouse. He just can't shake the feeling that he's done something to her...

Core Scramble.author: Euho Jun
Core Scramble.description: Monsters called “Bugs” plague the world. Chaeun, a member of the bug-exterminating organization "C.O.,” finds his chief, Gayoon, both infuriating and admirable. Meanwhile, Chaeun catches the attention of Moonhoo, a member of the rival organization. What will become of this love triangle in this dangerous world?

BASKI.author: CHUL-SOO JIN
BASKI.description: A bank heist… committed by people with superpowers. When this news reaches police officer Young-In Jin, he suspects it could be linked to a meteorite crash he saw with his friends years ago. What are his childhood friends hiding? And why does he suddenly wake up in a strange room? As he digs deeper into the case, some shocking truths are revealed...

Lifeless Man.author: Kim Nyeong
Lifeless Man.description: Jun Ha can see the lifespan of everyone. Years ago, he was traumatized when he realized one of his high school friends had the shortest lifespan and yet he was unable to do anything. Years later, he's now a well known genius surgeon who ends up getting involved with a gangster who has no lifespan number...

Something About 30.author: Hyewon
Something About 30.description: At the age of 31, up-and-coming cartoonist Jiwon can't seem to get a date. Then she runs into her childhood crush at work — only he doesn't seem to recognize her! Will she be able to find love while juggling work, life, and her friendships? Born in '85, this is her story.

A Compendium of Ghosts.author: Lee Yul
A Compendium of Ghosts.description: Sejin, a shaman’s daughter, and Sang, who was teased for being easily scared, are childhood friends. Years later, Sang returns as a huntsman, but Sejin notices that a mysterious black ghost is trailing him. Will Sejin, who seems to be the only one to see the ghost, be able to save Sang and the huntsmen from the spirits that plague their village?

Something About Us.author: Lee Yunji
Something About Us.description: Gayoung and Woojin are practically an inseparable pair. In high school, they were always asked if they were dating or if one of them secretly had feelings for the other. For the most part, it has always been pretty platonic for the two. But now, things are starting to feel different.

Interview with a Murderer.author: KJK
Interview with a Murderer.description: Clark needs a story. Luckily, an old flame reaches out claiming to be the psychiatrist of a man named Alex, otherwise known as the Triage Killer. Perhaps it’s doctor-patient confidentiality, but the doctor has yet to report Alex to the police. Instead, he’d like Clark to interview him as a part of his patient’s therapy. Alex only requires one thing in exchange: Clark.

Talk to Me Tenderly.author: SingSing
Talk to Me Tenderly.description: Gabriel, a virgin, was just calling to complain about a defective adult toy... but he instantly falls for the voice of the call center operator. Soon after, a man with the same deep, husky voice appears. What happens when two more beautiful men enter the picture? Surrounded by three gorgeous men, Gabriel's love life is about to be shaken up!

Dubious Moon.author: Yujeong Ju
Dubious Moon.description: Office worker Shiwon is fed up with her antisocial manager, Mr. Moon, who barely acknowledges her work. To everyone’s horror, Shiwon drunkenly calls out Mr. Moon in front of all of their co-workers. The next day, Shiwon means to apologize to Mr. Moon but… accidentally confesses her feelings? What’s more, Mr. Moon accepts? As their relationship deepens, will they be able to keep their office romance a secret?

The Knight's Unfulfilled Dreams.author: SUJIN KIM
The Knight's Unfulfilled Dreams.description: Ian and Prince Kaliyan were passionate lovers. But when Kaliyan finally rises to the throne, he condemns Ian’s brother, Robin, to a life in prison. Betrayed and enraged, Ian returns years later to assassinate Kaliyan. What will happen when Kaliyan threatens to kill Robin unless Ian becomes his lover? A convoluted story of hate, revenge, and lust.

Moonrise by the Cliff.author: JYL
Moonrise by the Cliff.description: A lone house perched on the cliff of a miserable little island, and the man who was dethroned and exiled there. I watched him on behalf of my sickly father... and I dared to fall in love with him. Without even knowing what my fate entailed.

The Scent of Love.author: Youngcho
The Scent of Love.description: Meet Arisol, the first female perfumer and aromatherapist of the Joseon Dynasty. Under the reign of King Seongjong, she cultivates her own plants and manages the perfumery of the royal court. Will she find love and success as she navigates her role as the scent master?

Corridor of Mirs.author: NOK
Corridor of Mirs.description: High school student Nabi is saved in a near-death experience by a mysterious, beautiful man. Turns out, only she saw him. Ever since that day, Nabi begins seeing dark, ominous beings called ‘Reapers,’ parasite-like creatures that feed on negative energy. With the help of the mysterious man, Nabi is introduced to a world she never knew existed. Will Nabi be able to hone her abilities and survive in this world?

Ripple Rooter.author: ILZI
Ripple Rooter.description: Vincent pretends to be a librarian in a small village, but really, he’s a supernatural messenger who delivers gifts of fate to humans. Arugio, a new cop, has a mysterious agenda, bringing up forgotten crime files. What will happen when kidnapping cases spike and the evidence points to Vincent? A mystery thriller fantasy to keep you on your toes.

Thirsty Thirty.author: JUNG EunSoo
Thirsty Thirty.description: Yaeun is on the cusp of turning thirty — no longer a child, but not yet quite an adult. She spends her days working full-time as the director of a lighting company and sees her boyfriend on the weekends. So why does she feel like something's missing? Is there more to life than just work and love?

Wistful Summer.author: Munzi
Wistful Summer.description: From the day they met that fateful summer’s day, Henry has secretly been in love with his best friend Sam. But time went on, Sam got married, and Henry kept his first love boxed away in his heart. Twenty years later, their paths cross again, and Henry finds his emotions reigniting once more.
